timeouts

public boolean timeouts

See Also:
Connector.open(String,int,boolean)

timeout

public int timeout
The amount of time in milliseconds for which the implementation will attempt to successfully transmit a packet before it throws InterruptedIOException. Java System property "bluecove.obex.timeout" can be used to define the value.

mtu

public int mtu
You can increase network speed by changing mtu to bigger value. Java System property "bluecove.obex.mtu" can be used to define the value.
